Name: Improved Portable TV
Desc: Has a high chance of dropping random <color=#CD5555>Elemental Battlefield Equipment</color>. Can choose one from the provided.

Name: Experimental Portable TV
Desc: Has a high chance of dropping random <color=#CD5555>Battlefield Equipment</color>. Can choose one from the provided.

Name: Stable Portable TV
Desc: Has a high chance of dropping random <color=#9AB7D4>Standby Equipment</color>. Can choose one from the provided.

Name: Prototype Portable TV
Desc: Randomly drops <color=#CD5555>Standby</color> or <color=#9AB7D4>Battlefield</color> Equipment. Can choose one from the provided.

Name: Advanced Portable TV
Desc: Has a very high chance of dropping equipment from the sets owned. Can choose one from the provided.

Name: Prototype Portable TV
Desc: Randomly drops <color=#CD5555>Standby</color> or <color=#9AB7D4>Battlefield</color> Equipment. Can choose one from the provided.
